minimalmenu.config.option.general.openFo: 需要打开添加打开游戏目录按钮。可以在标题画面和暂停画面看到。

modmenu.summaryTranslation.minimalmenu: Removes the clutter from the title screen. This small lightweight mod gets rid of the language, accessibility, and Minecraft Realm boxes. All are independently configurable.
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.minimalme: Removes the clutter from the title screen. This small lightweight mod gets rid of the language, accessibility, and Minecraft Realm boxes. All are independently configurable.
